page.title: 09CHILDREN AND RECREATION (1)
page.content: Every night when we come home from school we go to the park.There are swings,monkey bars and a slide.There is plenty of space and we play rounders,cricket,football and use the wall ball.Sometimes we play games of catch and even join in with the girls when they start chanting songs. We like to break dance as we moonwalk,crabwalk and headspin.We can also catterpillar,side slide and King Tuck.It takes a lot of patience and practice to break dance. When we get bored we put our money together and buy a choice of sweets and organise competitions to win them. Occasionally we get out our bicycles and build small ramps to jump over and obstacles to ride around.When you have a few friends to play with time seems to fly.When there is nobody to play with on my street it gets boring.
